blocks.content: Define the midpoint operation. Definition 10.1 of [Schwabhauser] p. 88. See ~ ismidb , ~ midbtwn , and ~ midcgr . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 9-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-mid(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cmid, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpo(s1, s2, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), crio(s3, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, cv(s0)), cv(s3)), cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-mid(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  âŠ¢ midG =(s0 âˆˆ ð•Œ â†¦(s1 âˆˆ(Base ` s0), s2 âˆˆ(Base ` s0)â†¦ iota(s3 âˆˆ(Base ` s0), s2 =(((pInvG ` s0)` s3)` s1))))
  âŠ£ d(s1, s2)
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s1, s3)
  âŠ£ d(s0, s2)
  âŠ£ d(s2, s3)
  âŠ£ d(s0, s3)
}

blocks.name: df-lmi
blocks.content: Define the line mirroring function. Definition 10.3 of [Schwabhauser] p. 89. See ~ islmib . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-lmi(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(clmi, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, crn(cfv(clng, cv(s0))), cmpt(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), crio(s3, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(co(cv(s2), cfv(cmid, cv(s0)), cv(s3)), cv(s1)), wo(wbr(cv(s1), cfv(cperpg, cv(s0)), co(cv(s2), cfv(clng, cv(s0)), cv(s3))), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)))))))))
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-lmi(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  âŠ¢ lInvG =(s0 âˆˆ ð•Œ â†¦(s1 âˆˆ ran((LineG ` s0))â†¦(s2 âˆˆ(Base ` s0)â†¦ iota(s3 âˆˆ(Base ` s0),((s2[(midG ` s0)]s3)âˆˆ s1 âˆ§(s1[(perpG ` s0)](s2[(LineG ` s0)]s3)âˆ¨ s2 = s3))))))
  âŠ£ d(s2, s3)
  âŠ£ d(s0, s2)
  âŠ£ d(s1, s2)
  âŠ£ d(s0, s3)
  âŠ£ d(s1, s3)
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
}

blocks.name: midf
blocks.content: Midpoint as a function. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm midf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wf(cfv(cmid, c0), cxp(c1, c1), c1))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cds, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(citv, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cstrkgld, nat2))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wf(cfv(cmid, c0), cxp(c1, c1), c1), wf(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, crio(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0))))), cxp(c1, c1), c1))
  sylib(w0, wf(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, crio(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0))))), cxp(c1, c1), c1), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wcel(crio(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0)))), c1))))
  syl(w0, wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wcel(crio(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0)))), c1))), wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c1, wreu(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0)))))))
  ralrimivva(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, w0, wreu(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0)))))
  mideu(hs2, c1, cv(hs1), cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs0), c0, c2, c3, cfv(clng, c0), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))))
  eqid(cfv(clng, c0))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wcel(c0, cstrkg))
  eqid(cfv(cmir, c0))
  simprl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  simprr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wbr(c0, cstrkgld, nat2))
  2ralimi(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, wreu(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0)))), wcel(crio(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0)))), c1))
  riotacl(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0))))
  fmpt2(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, crio(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0)))), c1, cmpo(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, crio(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0))))))
  eqid(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, crio(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0))))))
  feq1d(cfv(cmid, c0), cxp(c1, c1), c1, cmpo(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, crio(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0))))), w0)
  fvmptd3(hs3, cmid, c0, cmpo(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, crio(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0))))), universe, cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)), crio(hs2, cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, cv(hs3)), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0))))), universe, w0)
  df-mid(hs3, hs0, hs1, hs2)
  mpoeq123dv(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)), crio(hs2, cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, cv(hs3)), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0)))), c1, c1, crio(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs3), c0))
  riotaeqbidv(hs2, cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)), c1, wceq(cv(hs3), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, cv(hs3)), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0))))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)), c1, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(hs3), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs3), c0, cbs)
  eqeq2d(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, cv(hs3)), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0)), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs3), c0))
  fveq1d(cfv(cfv(cmir, cv(hs3)), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs3), c0))
  fveq1d(cfv(cmir, cv(hs3)), cv(hs2), cfv(cmir, c0), wceq(cv(hs3), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs3), c0, cmir)
  elexd(c0, cstrkg, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, crio(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0))))), universe))
  mpt2ex(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, crio(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0)))))
  fvexi(c1, cbs, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs2.c(cfv(cmir, c0))
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c(cfv(clng, c0))
  diff.hs2.w(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs3.c(c0)
  diff.hs3.c(cmpo(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, crio(hs2, c1, wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c0), cv(hs2)), cv(hs0))))))
  diff.hs3.c(universe)
  diff.hs3.s(hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs3.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs3.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(hs3), c0))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cv(hs3), c0))
  diff.hs2.w(wceq(cv(hs3), c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm midf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’((midG ` c0):(c1 Ã— c1)â†’ c1))
  âŠ£ c1 =(Base ` c0)
  âŠ£ c2 =(dist ` c0)
  âŠ£ c3 =(Itv ` c0)
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ TarskiG)
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c0[TarskiGDim>=]2)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, ((midG ` c0):(c1 Ã— c1)â†’ c1), ((hs0 âˆˆ c1, hs1 âˆˆ c1 â†¦ iota(hs2 âˆˆ c1, hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0))):(c1 Ã— c1)â†’ c1))
  sylib(w0, ((hs0 âˆˆ c1, hs1 âˆˆ c1 â†¦ iota(hs2 âˆˆ c1, hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0))):(c1 Ã— c1)â†’ c1), âˆ€(hs0 âˆˆ c1, âˆ€(hs1 âˆˆ c1, iota(hs2 âˆˆ c1, hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0))âˆˆ c1)))
  syl(w0, âˆ€(hs0 âˆˆ c1, âˆ€(hs1 âˆˆ c1, iota(hs2 âˆˆ c1, hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0))âˆˆ c1)), âˆ€(hs0 âˆˆ c1, âˆ€(hs1 âˆˆ c1, âˆƒ!(hs2 âˆˆ c1, hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0)))))
  ralrimivva(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, w0, âˆƒ!(hs2 âˆˆ c1, hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0)))
  mideu(hs2, c1, hs1, (pInvG ` c0), hs0, c0, c2, c3, (LineG ` c0), (w0 âˆ§(hs0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ hs1 âˆˆ c1)))
  eqid((LineG ` c0))
  adantr(w0, (hs0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ hs1 âˆˆ c1), c0 âˆˆ TarskiG)
  eqid((pInvG ` c0))
  simprl(w0, hs0 âˆˆ c1, hs1 âˆˆ c1)
  simprr(w0, hs0 âˆˆ c1, hs1 âˆˆ c1)
  adantr(w0, (hs0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ hs1 âˆˆ c1), c0[TarskiGDim> =]2)
  2ralimi(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, âˆƒ!(hs2 âˆˆ c1, hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0)), iota(hs2 âˆˆ c1, hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0))âˆˆ c1)
  riotacl(hs2, c1, hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0))
  fmpt2(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, iota(hs2 âˆˆ c1, hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0)), c1, (hs0 âˆˆ c1, hs1 âˆˆ c1 â†¦ iota(hs2 âˆˆ c1, hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0))))
  eqid((hs0 âˆˆ c1, hs1 âˆˆ c1 â†¦ iota(hs2 âˆˆ c1, hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0))))
  feq1d((midG ` c0), (c1 Ã— c1), c1, (hs0 âˆˆ c1, hs1 âˆˆ c1 â†¦ iota(hs2 âˆˆ c1, hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0))), w0)
  fvmptd3(hs3, cmid, c0, (hs0 âˆˆ c1, hs1 âˆˆ c1 â†¦ iota(hs2 âˆˆ c1, hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0))), universe, (hs0 âˆˆ(Base ` hs3), hs1 âˆˆ(Base ` hs3)â†¦ iota(hs2 âˆˆ(Base ` hs3), hs1 =(((pInvG ` hs3)` hs2)` hs0))), universe, w0)
  df-mid(hs3, hs0, hs1, hs2)
  mpoeq123dv(hs0, hs1, (Base ` hs3), (Base ` hs3), iota(hs2 âˆˆ(Base ` hs3), hs1 =(((pInvG ` hs3)` hs2)` hs0)), c1, c1, iota(hs2 âˆˆ c1, hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0)), hs3 = c0)
  riotaeqbidv(hs2, (Base ` hs3), c1, hs3 = c0, hs1 =(((pInvG ` hs3)` hs2)` hs0), hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0))
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs3), c1, (Base ` c0), hs3 = c0)
  fveq2(hs3, c0, cbs)
  eqeq2d(hs1, (((pInvG ` hs3)` hs2)` hs0), (((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0), hs3 = c0)
  fveq1d(((pInvG ` hs3)` hs2), hs0, ((pInvG ` c0)` hs2), hs3 = c0)
  fveq1d((pInvG ` hs3), hs2, (pInvG ` c0), hs3 = c0)
  fveq2(hs3, c0, cmir)
  elexd(c0, cstrkg, w0)
  a1i(w0, (hs0 âˆˆ c1, hs1 âˆˆ c1 â†¦ iota(hs2 âˆˆ c1, hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0)))âˆˆ ð•Œ)
  mpt2ex(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, iota(hs2 âˆˆ c1, hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0)))
  fvexi(c1, cbs, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(hs1)
  diff.hs2.c((pInvG ` c0))
  diff.hs2.c(hs0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c((LineG ` c0))
  diff.hs2.w((w0 âˆ§(hs0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ hs1 âˆˆ c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs3.c(c0)
  diff.hs3.c((hs0 âˆˆ c1, hs1 âˆˆ c1 â†¦ iota(hs2 âˆˆ c1, hs1 =(((pInvG ` c0)` hs2)` hs0))))
  diff.hs3.c(universe)
  diff.hs3.s(hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs3.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs3.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.w(hs3 = c0)
  diff.hs1.w(hs3 = c0)
  diff.hs2.w(hs3 = c0)
}

blocks.name: ismidb
blocks.content: Property of the midpoint. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm ismidb(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(c1, c2), c3)), wceq(co(c3, cfv(cmid, c4), c0), c2)))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cds, c4))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(citv, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c4, cstrkgld, nat2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmir, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
} = {
  bitr4d(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(c1, c2), c3)), wceq(co(c3, cfv(cmid, c4), c0), c2), wceq(crio(hs0, c5, wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), c3))), c2))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(c1, c2), c3)), wceq(crio(hs0, c5, wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), c3))), c2)), wcel(c2, c5), wreu(hs0, c5, wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), c3))))
  riota2(hs0, c2, c5, wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), c3)), wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(c1, c2), c3)))
  eqeq2d(c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), c3), cfv(cfv(c1, c2), c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  fveq1d(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(c1, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c2, c1)
  eqeq1d(co(c3, cfv(cmid, c4), c0), c2, crio(hs0, c5, wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), c3))), w0)
  ovmpt2d(hs1, hs2, c3, cfv(cmid, c4), c0, crio(hs0, c5, wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), c3))), c5, c5, crio(hs0, c5, wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))), c5, w0)
  fvmptd3(hs3, cmid, c4, cmpo(hs1, hs2, c5, c5, crio(hs0, c5, wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))), universe, cmpo(hs1, hs2, cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)), crio(hs0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, cv(hs3)), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))), universe, w0)
  df-mid(hs3, hs1, hs2, hs0)
  mpoeq123dv(hs1, hs2, cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)), crio(hs0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, cv(hs3)), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))), c5, c5, crio(hs0, c5, wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))), wceq(cv(hs3), c4))
  riotaeqbidv(hs0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)), c5, wceq(cv(hs3), c4), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, cv(hs3)), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs3)), c5, cfv(cbs, c4), wceq(cv(hs3), c4))
  fveq2(cv(hs3), c4, cbs)
  eqeq2d(cv(hs2), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, cv(hs3)), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), cfv(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs3), c4))
  fveq1d(cfv(cfv(cmir, cv(hs3)), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs3), c4))
  fveq1d(cfv(cmir, cv(hs3)), cv(hs0), c1, wceq(cv(hs3), c4))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cmir, cv(hs3)), c1, cfv(cmir, c4), wceq(cv(hs3), c4))
  fveq2(cv(hs3), c4, cmir)
  elexd(c4, cstrkg, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cmpo(hs1, hs2, c5, c5, crio(hs0, c5, wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))), universe))

  mpbird(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c1), co(c0, cfv(cmid, c1), c2)), c0)), wceq(co(c0, cfv(cmid, c1), c2), co(c0, cfv(cmid, c1), c2)))

blocks.name: mirmid
blocks.content: Point inversion preserves midpoints. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 12-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm mirmid(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(cmid, c2), cfv(c0, c3)), cfv(c0, co(c1, cfv(cmid, c2), c3))))

  -| wceq(c6, cfv(citv, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c2, cstrkgld, nat2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(cmir, c2), c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, c4))
} = {
  mpbid(w0, wceq(co(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(cmid, c2), cfv(c0, c3)), cfv(c0, co(c1, cfv(cmid, c2), c3))), wceq(cfv(c0, c3), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c2), cfv(c0, co(c1, cfv(cmid, c2), c3))), cfv(c0, c1))))
  eqtrd(cfv(c0, c3), cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c2), cfv(c0, co(c1, cfv(cmid, c2), c3))), cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(c0, cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c2), co(c1, cfv(cmid, c2), c3)), c1)), w0)
  fveq2d(c0, c3, cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c2), co(c1, cfv(cmid, c2), c3)), c1), w0)
  mpbird(w0, wceq(c3, cfv(cfv(cfv(cmir, c2), co(c1, cfv(cmid, c2), c3)), c1)), wceq(co(c1, cfv(cmid, c2), c3), co(c1, cfv(cmid, c2), c3)))
  eqidd(co(c1, cfv(cmid, c2), c3), w0)
  ismidb(c3, cfv(cmir, c2), co(c1, cfv(cmid, c2), c3), c1, c2, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  mirmir2(c0, cfv(cmir, c2), co(c1, cfv(cmid, c2), c3), c1, c4, c2, c5, c6, cfv(clng, c2), c7, w0)

  mircl(c0, co(c1, cfv(cmid, c2), c3), c4, c2, c5, c6, cfv(clng, c2), cfv(cmir, c2), c7, w0)

}

blocks.name: lmicl
blocks.content: Closure of the line mirror. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm lmicl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cds, c3))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(citv, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c3, cstrkgld, nat2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(clmi, c3), c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(clng, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, crn(c7)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
} = {
  ffvelrnd(c0, c1, c2, c2, w0)
  lmif(c0, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lmicl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’(c0 ` c1)âˆˆ c2)
  âŠ£ c2 =(Base ` c3)
  âŠ£ c4 =(dist ` c3)
  âŠ£ c5 =(Itv ` c3)
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c3 âˆˆ TarskiG)
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c3[TarskiGDim>=]2)
  âŠ£ c0 =((lInvG ` c3)` c6)
  âŠ£ c7 =(LineG ` c3)
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c6 âˆˆ ran(c7))
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c1 âˆˆ c2)
} = {
  ffvelrnd(c0, c1, c2, c2, w0)
  lmif(c0, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
}

blocks.name: lmicom
blocks.content: The line mirroring function is an involution. Theorem 10.4 of [Schwabhauser] p. 89. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Dec-2019.)

thm lmicom(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2))

  -| wceq(c8, cfv(clng, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, crn(c8)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c2), c1))
} = {
  eqcomd(cfv(c0, c1), c2, w0)
  mpbir2and(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(c0, c1)), wcel(co(c1, cfv(cmid, c4), c2), c7), wo(wbr(c7, cfv(cperpg, c4), co(c1, c8, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)))
  eqeltrrd(co(c1, cfv(cmid, c4), c2), c7, co(c2, cfv(cmid, c4), c1), w0)

blocks.name: lmilmi
blocks.content: Line mirroring is an involution. Theorem 10.5 of [Schwabhauser] p. 89. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Dec-2019.)

thm lmilmi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {

  -| wceq(c5, cfv(citv, c3))

  -| wi(w0, wbr(c3, cstrkgld, nat2))

} = {
  lmicom(c0, cfv(c0, c1), c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
  lmicl(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)

}

blocks.name: lmiiso
blocks.content: The line mirroring function is an isometry, i.e. it is conserves congruence. Because it is also a bijection, it is also a motion. Theorem 10.10 of [Schwabhauser] p. 89. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm lmiiso(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(cfv(c0, c1), c2, cfv(c0, c3)), co(c1, c2, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cds, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(citv, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c5, cstrkgld, nat2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cfv(clmi, c5), c7))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(clng, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, crn(c8)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
} = {
  lmiisolem(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, c8, cfv(cfv(cmir, c5), co(co(c1, cfv(cmid, c5), cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(cmid, c5), co(c3, cfv(cmid, c5), cfv(c0, c3)))), co(co(c1, cfv(cmid, c5), cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(cmid, c5), co(c3, cfv(cmid, c5), cfv(c0, c3))), w0)
  eqid(cfv(cfv(cmir, c5), co(co(c1, cfv(cmid, c5), cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(cmid, c5), co(c3, cfv(cmid, c5), cfv(c0, c3)))))
  eqid(co(co(c1, cfv(cmid, c5), cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(cmid, c5), co(c3, cfv(cmid, c5), cfv(c0, c3))))
}

blocks.name: trgcopy
blocks.content: Triangle construction: a copy of a given triangle can always be constructed in such a way that one side is lying on a half-line, and the third vertex is on a given half-plane: existence part. First part of Theorem 10.16 of [Schwabhauser] p. 92. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 4-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: trgcopyeu
blocks.content: Triangle construction: a copy of a given triangle can always be constructed in such a way that one side is lying on a half-line, and the third vertex is on a given half-plane: uniqueness part. Second part of Theorem 10.16 of [Schwabhauser] p. 92. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Aug-2020.)
